category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: PSM_effectivity_date_format
preference.preference_description: Specify the format of effectivity date to display. Valid Values: * DefaultDateFormat: Date would be displayed in the format %d-%b-%Y %H:%M * DownToSecondsDefaultDateFormat: Date would be displayed in the format %d-%b-%Y %H:%M:%S * DefaultDateOnlyFormat: Date would be displayed in the format %d-%b-%Y * DefaultTimeOnlyFormat: Date would be displayed in the format %H:%M
